languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс хмыкает и начинает говорить подчеркнуто официальным тоном.{/n} "Следуя воле Лорд-инквизитора Ксавьера Калькасара, в долг коего вверено охранение {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольному Торговцу{/g} династии фон Валанциус надлежит принять на борт агента святейшей {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g}, обеспечить сопровождение и содействие в делах великих и малых, что призваны уберечь владения Империума от врагов его. Сей приказ считается действительным с момента изъявления его и остается в силе до решения его сиятельства Калькасара".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс хмыкает и начинает говорить подчеркнуто официальным тоном.{/n} "Следуя воле Лорд Инквизитора Ксавьера Калькасара, в долг коего вверено охранение Простора Коронус, Вольному Торговцу династии фон Валанциус надлежит принять на борт агента святейшей Инквизиции, обеспечить сопровождение и содействие в делах великих и малых, что призваны уберечь владения Империума от врагов его. Сей приказ считается действительным с момента изъявления его и остается в силе до решения его сиятельства Калькасара".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat and begins in a pointedly official tone,{/n} "By the order of Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, whose duty is to stand sentinel over the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius is to take on board the agent of the Most Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} and provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the Imperium against its enemies. This decree is effective immediately upon announcement and remains in effect until decided otherwise by His Excellency Calcazar."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс хмыкает и начинает говорить подчеркнуто официальным тоном.{/n} "Следуя воле Лорд-инквизитора Ксавьера Калькасара, в долг коего вверено охранение {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольному Торговцу{/g} династии фон Валанциус надлежит принять на борт агента святейшей {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g}, обеспечить сопровождение и содействие в делах великих и малых, что призваны уберечь владения Империума от врагов его. Сей приказ считается действительным с момента изъявления его и остается в силе до решения его сиятельства Калькасара".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix huffs and begins in a pointedly official tone,{/n} "Following the will of Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, whose duty is to stand sentinel over the Koronus Expanse, the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius is to take on board the agent of the most holy Inquisition and provide escort and support in deeds great and small which serve to safeguard the territories of the Imperium against its enemies. This decree is effective immediately upon announcement and remains in effect until decided otherwise by His Excellency Calcazar."

This decree is effective immediately upon announcement and remains in effect until decided otherwise by His Excellency Calcazar."

This decree is effective immediately upon announcement and remains in effect until decided otherwise by His Excellency Calcazar."

{n}Heinrix clears his throat and begins in a pointedly official tone,{/n} "By the order of Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, whose duty is to stand sentinel over the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius is to take on board the agent of the Most Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} and provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the Imperium against its enemies. This decree is effective immediately upon announcement and remains in effect until decided otherwise by His Excellency Calcazar."

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは咳払いをすると、改めて公式な口調で話し始めた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の監視役を務めるロード・インクィジター、ザビエル・カルカサルの命により、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}はもっとも神聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}の代理人を乗船させ、帝国の領土を敵から守るための大小さまざまな所業において護衛と支援を提供せねばならない。この命令は発表と同時に効力を有し、カルカサル閣下が停止を決定されるまで有効とする」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat and begins in a pointedly official tone,{/n} "By the order of Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, whose duty is to stand sentinel over the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius is to take on board the agent of the Most Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} and provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the Imperium against its enemies. This decree is effective immediately upon announcement and remains in effect until decided otherwise by His Excellency Calcazar."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは咳払いをすると、改めて公式な口調で話し始めた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}の監視役を務めるロード・インクィジター、ザビエル・カルカサルの命により、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}はもっとも神聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}の代理人を乗船させ、帝国の領土を敵から守るための大小さまざまな所業において護衛と支援を提供せねばならない。この命令は発表と同時に効力を有し、カルカサル閣下が停止を決定されるまで有効とする」

languages.text: {n}海因里希清了清嗓子，以标准的官方口吻说了起来。{/n}“根据负责守卫{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的大审判官希维尔·卡尔卡扎的命令，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}即将接纳至高神圣{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}的代理人，并在大大小小的行动中提供护航与支持，保卫帝国的领土不受敌人侵害。本法令自宣布之日起即刻生效，在尊贵的卡尔卡扎大人另有命令之前始终有效。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat and begins in a pointedly official tone,{/n} "By the order of Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, whose duty is to stand sentinel over the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius is to take on board the agent of the Most Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} and provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the Imperium against its enemies. This decree is effective immediately upon announcement and remains in effect until decided otherwise by His Excellency Calcazar."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希清了清嗓子，以标准的官方口吻说了起来。{/n}“根据负责守卫{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的审判长希维尔·卡尔卡扎的命令，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}即将接纳至高神圣{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}的代理人，并在大大小小的行动中提供护航与支持，保卫帝国的领土不受敌人侵害。本法令自宣布之日起即刻生效，在尊贵的卡尔卡扎大人另有命令之前始终有效。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se aclara la garganta y espeta en un tono marcadamente oficial:{/n} «Por orden del Lord Inquisidor Xavier Calcazar, responsable de perpetuar la centinela de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, {mf|el|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de la casa von Valancius ha de recibir a bordo al agente de la sacrísima {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g}, así como proporcionarle escolta y apoyo en hazañas grandes y pequeñas que sirvan para salvaguardar los territorios del Imperium contra sus enemigos. Este decreto tendrá vigor inmediatamente después de su anuncio y permanecerá en vigor hasta que su excelencia Calcazar decida lo contrario».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat and begins in a pointedly official tone,{/n} "By the order of Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, whose duty is to stand sentinel over the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius is to take on board the agent of the Most Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} and provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the Imperium against its enemies. This decree is effective immediately upon announcement and remains in effect until decided otherwise by His Excellency Calcazar."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se aclara la garganta y espeta en un tono marcadamente oficial:{/n} «Por orden del Lord Inquisidor Xavier Calcazar, responsable de perpetuar la centinela de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, {mf|el|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de la casa von Valancius ha de recibir a bordo al agente de la sacrísima {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g}, así como proporcionarle escolta y apoyo en hazañas grandes y pequeñas que sirvan para salvaguardar los territorios del Imperium contra sus enemigos. Este decreto tendrá vigor inmediatamente después de su anuncio y permanecerá en vigor hasta que su excelencia Calcazar decida lo contrario».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix s'éclaircit la voix et annonce sur un ton solennel :{/n} « Sur ordre du seigneur inquisiteur Xavier Calcazar, chargé de la protection des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, {mf|le|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} de la maison von Valancius doit accepter à son bord l'agent de la très sainte {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} et lui fournir escorte et soutien dans toutes les actions qu'il entreprendra afin d'assurer la sauvegarde des territoires de l'Imperium contre les ennemis de ce dernier. Ce décret prend effet dès sa déclaration et restera en vigueur jusqu'à avis contraire de Son Excellence Calcazar. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat and begins in a pointedly official tone,{/n} "By the order of Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, whose duty is to stand sentinel over the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius is to take on board the agent of the Most Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} and provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the Imperium against its enemies. This decree is effective immediately upon announcement and remains in effect until decided otherwise by His Excellency Calcazar."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix s'éclaircit la voix et annonce sur un ton solennel :{/n} « Sur ordre du seigneur inquisiteur Xavier Calcazar, chargé de la protection des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, {mf|le|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} de la maison von Valancius doit accepter à son bord l'agent de la très sainte {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} et lui fournir escorte et soutien dans toutes les actions qu'il entreprendra afin d'assurer la sauvegarde des territoires de l'Imperium contre les ennemis de ce dernier. Ce décret prend effet dès sa déclaration et restera en vigueur jusqu'à avis contraire de Son Excellence Calcazar. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix räuspert sich und beginnt betont offiziell:{/n} "Auf Befehl von Großinquisitor Xavier Calcazar, dessen Pflicht darin besteht, über die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} zu wachen, muss {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}{/g} des Hauses von Valancius den Agenten der Heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} an Bord nehmen und ihn mit großen und kleinen Taten bei allem unterstützen, was dem Schutz der Territorien des Imperiums gegen seine Feinde dient. Dieser Erlass ist ab seiner Verkündung sofort gültig, und zwar bis zu einer gegenteiligen Entscheidung durch Seine Exzellenz Calcazar."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat and begins in a pointedly official tone,{/n} "By the order of Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, whose duty is to stand sentinel over the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius is to take on board the agent of the Most Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} and provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the Imperium against its enemies. This decree is effective immediately upon announcement and remains in effect until decided otherwise by His Excellency Calcazar."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix räuspert sich und beginnt betont offiziell:{/n} "Auf Befehl von Großinquisitor Xavier Calcazar, dessen Pflicht darin besteht, über die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} zu wachen, muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} des Hauses von Valancius den Agenten der Heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} an Bord nehmen und ihn mit großen und kleinen Taten bei allem unterstützen, was dem Schutz der Territorien des Imperiums gegen seine Feinde dient. Dieser Erlass ist ab seiner Verkündung sofort gültig, und zwar bis zu einer gegenteiligen Entscheidung durch Seine Exzellenz Calcazar."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, boğazını temizleyip bariz biçimde resmî bir ses tonuyla lafa giriyor.{/n} "Vazifesi {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nin{/g} başında nöbet tutmak olan Lord Engizisyoncu Xavier Calcazar'ın emirleri uyarınca von Valancius Hanesi'nin {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'i{/g}; Pek Kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon'un{/g} temsilcisini gemisine alacak, ona eşlik edecek ve İmparatorluk'un egemenlik alanını düşmanlara karşı koruma maksadıyla gerçekleştirilecek küçük veya büyük icraatlarda destek sağlayacaktır. İşbu ferman duyurulduğu andan itibaren geçerlidir ve Calcazar Ekselansları tarafından aksi belirtilmedikçe yürürlükte kalacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clears his throat and begins in a pointedly official tone,{/n} "By the order of Lord Inquisitor Xavier Calcazar, whose duty is to stand sentinel over the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius is to take on board the agent of the Most Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} and provide escort and support in deeds great and small that serve to safeguard the territories of the Imperium against its enemies. This decree is effective immediately upon announcement and remains in effect until decided otherwise by His Excellency Calcazar."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix boğazını temizleyip resmî bir ses tonuyla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Görevi {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nin başında nöbet tutmak olan Lord Engizisyoncu Xavier Calcazar'ın emirleri uyarınca Von Valancius Hanesi'nin {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'i, Pek Kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon{/g}'un vekilini gemisine alacak, ona eşlik edecek ve İmparatorluk'un topraklarını düşmanlara karşı korumak amacıyla gerçekleştirilen küçük veya büyük icraatlarda destek sağlayacaktır. Bu kararname duyurulduğu andan itibaren geçerlidir ve Calcazar Ekselansları tarafından aksi belirtilmedikçe yürürlükte kalacaktır."
